ecobari.title: EcoBari – Gardening Community Platform
ecobari.description: A community-driven platform for gardening lovers to connect, share tips, ask questions, and join local gardening events. Built for plant enthusiasts, composters, hydroponic hobbyists, and every green thumb in between.
challenges: Designing a clean yet content-rich UI for both beginners and experts
Managing protected routes and secure dashboard content
Handling image uploads and managing different content visibility states
futurePlans: Add comment and reply system to posts
Enable plant disease detection with AI integration

runnexus.title: RunNexus – Marathon Management System
runnexus.description: A full-featured platform for organizing and participating in marathons. Runners and organizers can manage events, registrations, and dashboards with a clean and responsive UI.
challenges: Securing admin-only routes using Firebase Admin SDK
Managing event registration deadlines and state updates dynamically
Creating a flexible dashboard system for both runners and organizers
futurePlans: Introduce real-time chat between organizers and participants
Launch a mobile version with push notifications

boxnetic.title: Boxnetic – Subscription Box Platform
boxnetic.description: A personalized subscription box platform offering curated boxes tailored to user interests like gadgets, books, and more. Users can explore, subscribe, manage their boxes, and leave feedback.
challenges: Designing dynamic routes for category-based subscription boxes
Managing responsive layout for complex box card designs
futurePlans: Add subscription billing with Stripe integration
Allow users to gift boxes to friends and family
Introduce loyalty rewards and limited-time mystery boxes
